Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I'm CallisTrOn and I play KSP for maybe 2 years now. On my youtube channel CallisTrOn Entertainment you find some (more or less) entertaining videos. I'm working on improving the quality of the videos, so maybe it is worth to check them out.

I joined the forum now, because I will start a big challenge event named KSP Raceleague. You will find the thread of it in the challenge forum (soon). I hope some of you will take part :-)

And I got 2 problems with the forum. I can't put an avatar in my profile, and I don't know where I can edit my signature. Would be awesome if someone could help me.

Welcome to the forum (at last! how could you keep playing KSP for that long without joining before? ).

Your "problems" with the forum are the same every new user finds: until you have at least 3 posts approved, there are some restrictions in what you can do, among them editing avatar and signature. Just wait until you have enough posts.
